entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon.
